title: Did Jared Kouchner break his Twitter account after Manfort was charged?
subtitle: The unfounded rumor that Jared Kouchner surveyed his Twitter account was circulated following Paul Manafort's accusation.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Jared Kouchner surveyed his Twitter account shortly after private lawyer Robert S. Muller III disclosed charges against three former Trump campaign officials in October 2017.
